title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8197-2.5 - Exception for certain waterworks companies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8197-2.5 - Exception for certain waterworks companies

State Regulations

Waterworks com panies with operating revenues for the
immediately preceding fiscal year of less than $250,000 are not required to
file the financial statements described in section
8197-2.1
(a) of this Subpart, provided that they file an application for exemption from that
requirement. Waterworks companies with operating revenues for the immediately
preceding fiscal year of at least $250,000 but less than $700,000 shall file
audited financial statements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8197-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
